title: Bug 102623 - Image cannot be refreshed after importing again
description: When trying to refresh an imported image in the layout view, the image does not get updated correctly.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the image cannot be refreshed.
EB: The imported image 'image1.jpg' should be successfully refreshed after updating the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the Outline panel.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Attempt to refresh the image in the layout view.
